subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two of David Robinson’s three sons attend the Carver Academy, an independent, faith-based school in San Antonio. Robinson not only works at the school, but he and his wife, Valerie, also founded it in 1997.
snippet: Two of David Robinson’s three sons attend the Carver Academy, an independent, faith-based school in San Antonio. Robinson not only works at the school, but he and his wife, Valerie, also founded it in 1997.
